data.title: NVA. From Sonnenallee to the People's Army. A movie on DVD #26962
data.meta_description: NVA. From Sonnenallee to the People's Army. A movie on DVD #26962. ✓ fast worldwide shipping! ✓ contact: electronics@m-wa.re
data.text:
1. Payment

Germany

PayPal-Express payment

Direct Debit

Credit Card

Pay upon invoice

Pay in advance

Authorities and ompanies located in Germany are supplied on presentation of a valid VAT registration number on account with 30 days of payment

EU, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Monaco, Serbia, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Isle of Man

PayPal-Express payment

Credit Card

Pay in advance

Net invoice

Companies in the EU can buy free of VAT, Please attach your VAT no. during the checkout to get a net invoice.

worldwide

PayPal-Express payment

Credit Card

Pay in advance

When paying by direct debit or by credit card, the burden of your account can be made immediately after receipt of your order.

2. Shipping

Shipping prices with quantity discount

Please note: details on delivery times

Germany

Deutsche Post: first item €4.90, add. €1.00 for each further item, max. €11.90.

DHL: first item €5.90, add. €1.00 for each further item, max. €11.90.

No COD.

Of course you can collect your order from us. Please arrange before a pick-up date under 0341-33742448. Please note that your payment is only possible through: bank transfer, PayPal, credit cards.

EU

Deutsche Post: first item €9.90, add. €1.00 for each further item, max. €17.90.

DHL: first item €19.90, add. €1.00 for each further item, max. €29.90.

worldwide

Deutsche Post: first item €12.90, add. EUR1.00 for each further item, max. €29.90.

DHL: first item €29.90, add. €1.00 for each further item, max. €49.90.

For deliveries to non-EU countries additional duties, taxes and fees. For more information for import turnover tax please read Taxation Procedure and specially for Switzerland below Swiss working tariff

International Buyers – Please Note

Fees, taxes and duties for the import of goods are not included in the item price or the shipping charges. These charges are the buyer responsibility.

Please inquire prior to bidding or buy from your local Customs authority may apply the additional charges.

These charges are the normally collected by the customs authorities or Shipping Company demanded. Please do not misunderstand this as an additional shipping costs.
